formElement.label: Output Property:
formElement.documentation: The property that results will be returned into.

formElement.label: Location Name:
formElement.documentation: Name of location to newcopy in.

formElement.label: Location Type:
formElement.documentation: Location to newcopy in: must be 'CICS Configuration' for this procedure (to newcopy in other locations, use the NewcopyChgPkg procedure instead).

formElement.label: Object Type:
formElement.documentation: The object to newcopy's resource type.

formElement.label: Object Name:
formElement.documentation: The object to newcopy's resource name.

formElement.label: Object Group:
formElement.documentation: The object to newcopy's resource group.

formElement.label: Serialized Resource Object Criteria:
formElement.documentation: Any additional objects(s) to newcopy: XML serialized list of sets of MAPDEF/PROGDEF/PRTNDEF/DOCDEF object criteria, one per additional object, created using the procedure SerializeOtherObjectCriteria (optional, the object specified above is appended to this).

formElement.label: Phase-in:
formElement.documentation: Whether to do a phase-in action instead of a newcopy, to cater for in-use programs. For details, see the CICS documentation.

formElement.label: Qualification Data:
formElement.documentation: The Qualification Data is optional data passed through the Newcopy operations qualification exit point. The needs of your organization determine whether you use an exit program and what processing it performs.

formElement.label: Connections:
formElement.documentation: The CSD-based CICS regions on which to perform the newcopy or phasein. 'All': performs the action via all of the remote system connections defined in the CICS configuration (default), 'Local': performs the action on the CICS region that is running the CICS Configuration Manager server (Location Name mustspecify a CICS configuration that refers to the CSD file used by the CICS Configuration Manager server), 'Named': Performs the action via the remote system connections named in Connection Names.

editor.formElement: textarea), Connection Names: connectionNames 0 Whitespace-separated list of remote system connection names -- this is ignored unless Connections is set to 'Named'.
entry), Target Scope: TargetScope 0 If the change package contains candidates for migration to context-based CICS configurations, Target Scope is required.
